name: Grand Gangster Vegas – Real Mafia Crime City Games
name_original: Grand Gangster Vegas – Real Mafia Crime City Games
description: Be your own gamestar vegas mafia in this real game. You can get six different kind of guns types and many motor vehicle theft missions to take over the crime city and outrun the police officers, or just obey every traffic light. Robbery auto cars, evading cops, racing on streets, and shooting down other gangs in this free gangster game… Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles and be the best gangsta mafia scar in this Gun Games?
